original_text: So Peter was kept in prison, but the church was earnestly praying to God for him.
korean_text: 이에 베드로는 옥에 갇혔고 교회는 그를 위하여 간절히 하나님께 기도하더라

sentences.original_text: So Peter was kept in prison
but the church was earnestly praying to God for him
sentences.korean_translation: 교회는 그를 위해 하나님께 간절히 기도하고 있었다
